英文法規名稱: Standard of Filing Fees for The National Health Insurance Certificate
中文法規名稱: 全民健康保險保險憑證收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Bureau of National Health Insurance Order: Chien-Pao-Cheng 0970000182,stipulated on March 24, 2008
2.Amended on Article 2 on December 10, 2009 in accordance with Bureau of National Health Insurance Order Chien-Pao-Cheng 0980078255

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is stipulated in accordance to subparagraph 3, article 7 and article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

The filing fee for every National Health Insurance Certificate (hereinafter referred to as NHI IC Card) by the insured from the Insurer is NT$200. However, first time applicants, as well as card renewal applications due to one of the following reasons are free of charge:
1. Card disabled by non-artificial bending, scratching, cracking,or deforming of the exterior and the IC chip;or abrasion,discoloring, or falling off of the IC chip.
2. Misprinting of the insured’s basic information on the card by the Bureau.
This Standard is in effect on the date of its promulgation.
